text: The Polish Academy Award for Discovery of the Year has been awarded annually since 2008 by the Polish Film Academy. Award is given to the debutantes of Polish cinema, who are candidates to the Polish Academy Award for first time. == Winners and nominees == {| class="wikitable" !Year !Person !Movie title !Category |- ! rowspan="3" |2008 |Sonia Bohosiewicz |Rezerwat |Acting |- |Łukasz Palkowski |Rezerwat |Directing |- |Damian Ul |Sztuczki |Acting |- ! rowspan="3" |2009 |Elena Leszczyńska |Mała Moskwa |Acting |- |Adam Guziński |Chłopiec na galopującym koniu |Directing |- |Marieta Żukowska |Nieruchomy poruszyciel |Acting |- ! rowspan="3" |2010 |Borys Lankosz |Rewers |Directing |- |Katarzyna Rosłaniec |Galerianki |Directing |- |Paweł Borowski |Zero |Directing |- ! rowspan="3" |2011 |Mateusz Kościukiewicz |Wszystko, co kocham |Acting |- |Piotr Dumała |Las |Directing |- |Arkadiusz Jakubik |Prosta historia o miłości |Directing |- ! rowspan="3" |2012 |Jan Komasa |Sala samobójców |Directing |- |Adrian Panek |Daas |Directing |- |Leszek Dawid |Ki |Directing |- ! rowspan="3" |2013 |Michał Urbaniak |Mój rower |Acting |- |Marcin Kowalczyk |Jesteś Bogiem |Acting |- |Bartosz Konopka |Lęk wysokości |Directing |- ! rowspan="3" |2014 |Bodo Kox |Dziewczyna z szafy |Directing |- |Agata Trzebuchowska | rowspan="2" |Ida |Acting |- |Łukasz Żal |Cinematography |- ! rowspan="3" |2015 |Zofia Wichłacz |Miasto 44 |Acting |- |Ewa Gronowska |Bogowie |Costume designing |- |Kacper Fertacz |Hardkor Disko |Cinematography |- ! rowspan="3" |2016 |Agnieszka Smoczyńska |Córki dancingu |Directing |- |Magnus von Horn |Intruz |Directing |- |Justyna Suwała |Body/Ciało |Acting |} == External links == * http://www.pnf.pl Category:Polish film awards Category:Awards established in 2008
title: Polish Academy Award for Discovery of the Year
